sentences.en: A limousine swept her along the busy freeway to the airport.
sentences.cn: 一辆豪华轿车载着她沿着拥挤的高速公路飞速驶向机场。

sentences.en: Aha, you're one of those people who have freeway phobia, aren't you?
sentences.cn: 原来是这样啊, 你是那种有高速公路恐惧症的人, 对吧?

sentences.en: An accident held up the freeway.
sentences.cn: 一起事故让高速公路的交通几乎中断了.

sentences.en: Could you direct me to the eastbound freeway on ramp, please ?
sentences.cn: 可以告诉我往东走的高速公路入口在哪里 吗 ?

sentences.en: Everyone gawked at the smashed cars on the freeway.
sentences.cn: 每个人看到高速公路上那部撞得面目全非的车都目瞪口呆.

sentences.en: Have you seen anybody drive by since we got off the freeway?
sentences.cn: 你从我们走这条路开始见到过别人没?

sentences.en: I try to avoid driving next to hotheads on the freeway.
sentences.cn: 在快车道上,我尽量避免在急性子司机旁边开车.

sentences.en: Normally, twenty - five minutes, but today the freeway is terribly congested.
sentences.cn: 通常是 二十五分 钟, 不过今天高速公路严重堵塞.

sentences.en: The minimum speed on the freeway is 45 kms per hour.
sentences.cn: 这条高速公路上的最低时速为45公里.

sentences.en: The speed limit on the freeway is 55mph.
sentences.cn: 高速公路限速每小时55英里。

sentences.en: We saw a bad traffic accident on the freeway.
sentences.cn: 在高速公路上我们看见了一起严重的交通事故.

sentences.en: We were driving on a California freeway.
sentences.cn: 我们正沿着加利福尼亚的一条快车道驾车行驶.
我们正行驶在快车道上.

sentences.en: While talking, he changed freeway lanes , maneuvering the Fiat with one hand.
sentences.cn: 他一边讲话, 一边用一只手开着菲亚特离开了高速干道.

trans.tran_en: a very wide road in the US, built for fast travel
